author: Justin Harp
title: Clothes be damned! Miley Cyrus might just host the season premiere of Saturday Night Live naked - Fun
text: Miley Cyrus will be hosting the season premiere of Saturday Night Live stark naked â€“ if she has her way.The 'Dooo It!' popstar joins Taran Killam for SNL's first promos of the season to marvel about the concept of pants and dodge Taran's request to get her digits.Miley is pulling double duty as host and musical guest on Saturday Night Live this weekend, much like she did back in the fall of 2013.This time around, the singer is promoting the free release of her outrageous new studio album Miley Cyrus & Her Dead Petz.Following Miley's outing, Amy Schumer and The Weeknd will appear on October 10 while Tracy Morgan and Demi Lovato are lined up for October 17.Saturday Night Live airs at 11.30pm ET in the US.
